forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. South wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 76. North wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the sky leans towards a tranquil stillness, adorned with a canopy of mostly clear forecasted skies. Temperatures will dip to a cool 51 degrees, so if you step outside, a light jacket will be your best companion against the whispering south wind. The fragrance of the Bay drifts ever so gently, perhaps hinting at the faint touch of the night’s marine layer, yet there is little to dampen tonight’s serene ambiance.

Looking towards Monday, the day breaks with a promise of sunshine, basking the city in a warm embrace with highs hovering around 76. This clarity invites citizens to explore the vibrancy of the streets—a perfect day for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to the many cafes dotting the landscape. As the sun gradually lifts, consider a light, layered outfit to navigate the shifting temperatures throughout the day. Embrace the warmth, yet be prepared for the coolness that may still linger in the evening air—perfect for unwinding with a book in a cozy nook or meeting up with friends at a charming outdoor venue. San Francisco, with its winking lights and welcoming architecture, is an open invitation for those eager to experience its evening allure.
